game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the ancient temple and retrieve the legendary artifact.
game.description: A powerful artifact has been hidden within a long-abandoned temple deep in the jungle. Retrieve it before rival treasure hunters do.

task.objective: Speak with local villagers to gather information about the temple's location.
task.description: Village rumors have been circulating about a hidden temple deep in the jungle. Seek out Lila's contacts among the locals and learn more about its whereabouts.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous jungle to reach the ancient temple.
task.description: Journey through the dense foliage of the jungle, avoiding deadly traps and fending off wild beasts. Be prepared for anything!
